QuestData.Title: Hostage Situation
QuestData.Description: Our own people, sacrificed to the Legion!$b$bWe need to intercept a transport if we intend to put an end to this trade. I'm afraid this does mean you will be playing the part of a captive, my friend.$b$bBefore voicing your concerns, try to have a little faith.$b$bWe will follow behind in one of Deline's boats and break you out once we know where they are going.$b$bGo to the harbor and find a group of captives. Stand among them. Allow yourself to be taken.$b$bWe will not be far.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Astravar Harbor and join a group of captives being taken to Felsoul Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for taking this risk. Let us put an end to this now!
